For those who don't know, give JunitX 5.2 a try. This version of
JUnitX (st=
ill a JUnit extension) eases all private stuff testing. The
reflection stuf=
f is done for you. Thanks to javassist, you don't have
to create any extra =
classes (TestProxy classes) anymore.

Have a look at this "how to" where yo=
u can also find the jar file:
